overview_of_class: This course provides an introduction to the basic concepts of statistics. Throughout the course, students will learn to: summarize data using graphs and tables; explain/calculate descriptive statistics, confidence intervals, correlation, regression, and probability; and explain tests of significance and data-production including sampling and experiments. Basic knowledge of algebra is recommended.
name: Introduction to Statistics
title: SCS STAT 202-CN-15 Introduction to Statistics

descriptions.name: Overview of class
